content.description: Start on a ledge in the middle of the cave where the vertical wall meets the roof. Come straight out using the rail, jug flake, and pocket above the roof. Mantle/muscle-up topout.
content.location: Slightly right-of-middle of the cave/roof directly behind and under the cabin (near the chimney).

content.description: A compressy overhanging arete. Start hanging on the rail, pull to the ledge, then make use of some dimples on each side of the arete to work your way to the top. Topout's chill.
content.location: This sits along the wall closest to New Cross Drive by the cabin. If facing the cabin from New Cross Drive, this will be rightward or easterly (leftward if you're facing the cabin from behind). You can drop in on the east side of the cabin and turn right, and this will be on your right shortly.    This is also right by the southeast corner of the Carcass Boulder.

content.description: Start in a sandy two-handed slot to the right, traverse leftward along the mid-roof ledge, then make a big move to an edge and then the lip. Mantle/muscle-up and topout.   First half is chossy, but the last few holds and moves (almost) make it worth it.
content.location: Overhang/roof immediately behind and below the cabin.

content.description: Sub-area for problems near the cabin. Sorted from East-to-West instead of left-to-right I guess (as if facing towards New Cross from the river).
